[?2004h]0;aziz@eksporyuk: ~[01;32maziz@eksporyuk[00m:[01;34m~[00m$ mysql -u root -p aziz_member.eksporyuk.com -e "SELECT pm.post_id, pm.meta_key, pm.meta_value FROM wp_postmeta pm INNER JOIN wp_posts p ON pm.post_id = p.ID WHERE p.post_type = 'lesson' AND pm.meta_key REGEXP '(video|duration|thumbnail|attachment|file)' ORDER BY pm.post_id;" > /tmp/lesson_meta.tsv
